trans-unit.source: Sharethis
Test
Social Widget Plugins
Select this option to install social widget to your Typo3 Website

Enable Global Interface: Select this option to install globally social sharing widget to your Whole Typo3 website or disable this option if u needs to install social sharing widget in particular page in your Typo3 Website
Select a type of social widget
Add Publisher Id [Optional] : Your unique ShareThis publisher key
doNotHash [Optional] : This is the master option for CopyNShare.This overrides the doNotCopy and hasAddressBar setting. If true, the 2 options are ignored.
doNotCopy [Optional] : If false, “See more: yourURL.com#SThashtag” will appear after a user pastes texts after a copy action.
hashAddressBar [Optional] : If true, a special #hastag will be appended to the end of your address bar URL.
openDelay [Optional] : Set a timer to open a Advertise
closeDelay [Optional] : Set a timer to close a Advertise
visible [Optional] : Set visibility of Advertisement
position : Change the position of social widget.See what fits your site design better.
chicklets [Optional] : Turn On/Off if you want to add more sharing tool
items : Add Items for Sharing Tool
Select type of widget
Select button type for simple widget
Select ......
Simple Social Widget Button
Widget in Sidebar
Large Button
Display text with button
Small Button
Buttons with Hit Count - Horizontal
Buttons with Hit Count - Vertical
